Text.Page: Are you heading for the Ebon Tower? I know I can't be much help to you, but I will be praying for your safe return. Please come back safely.
You entered the Ebon Tower and defeated Thulsa, who ran, leaving a trail of blood behind him. Kelsaik was nowhere to be seen...

The teleportal in the Ebon Tower won't work no matter what you do. There's only one key that works, and it's...

...Killian's gem? You have it? And you're going in? Here's what we know; it's not much. There are five levels in the tower, and everything is toxic, thanks to Thulsa. Don't forget to use that purification totem.
